title: The Carolina Play-Book
aka: The Carolina Play-Book of the Carolina Playmakers and the Carolina Dramatic Association

last-issue.note: A commemorative issue published to celebrate the 50th anniversary of the Carolina Dramatic Association.  The last regular issue known to the library of the University of North Carolina, the home of this periodical, is dated June-December 1944.

additional-note: Any plays published in this serial might have renewals under Drama, rather than under Contributions to Periodicals.  We have not surveyed Drama renewals, so it is possible there are issues with renewed material prior to the first contribution mentioned here.
